Key Match Events: New York went on a 13-0 run to take an 89-75 lead with 8:14 to play.
The Sixers missed seven consecutive shot attempts during that run.
Pre-Game Insights: The 2023 league MVP Joel Embiid was noticeably rusty, out of game shape and timid in what was his first game since helping Team USA win the gold medal at the Paris Olympics on Aug. 11.
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Nick Nurse said, "He was certainly rusty. Conditioning I think showed up fairly early..."
Embiid said, "I thought tonight we got in a nice rhythm, which we need to keep doing."
Miscellaneous Highlights: Paul George had his best game as a Sixer, finishing with 29 points, 10 rebounds, three assists, three steals, a block, and four turnovers.
Rookie guard Jared McCain had another solid scoring night, finishing with 23 points on 7-for-16 shooting.
Others: The Sixers dropped to 2-8 overall and 0-1 in the NBA Cup.
The Knicks improved to 5-5 and 1-0 in the NBA Cup standings.
